description:
Brent had his cowboy boots on. A big smile was plastered across his face.

“Oh, someone’s seen Brandon!” I said.

“Yes!” he said. “I saw him outside. He’s so hot!”

They hadn’t met each other officially yet, so when Brandon came in he gave Brent a big hug. I love how much of a teddy bear he’s become!

Brandon was very nurturing toward Brent. He smiled and laughed and did everything he could to make the situation comfortable.

I don’t think it was necessary, though. I had guessed that Brent is a bottom and I was right!
title: Brent & Brandon: Bareback
